name: Hoard (itch) (rulyhyperion82)
description: Who doesn't want a free TV? Nobody. But what if the TV is super old and terrible, and you don't even know if it turns on? Who would want it then? Hoarders would. You and 5 other AI characters all spot the TV at the same time, and you all want it. Since a rational discussion is the worst option, you all pull out your weapons and start fighting for the TV. Go get the free TV, and bring it back to your car before you are knocked out!
